A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is not a Star Wars movie. It's a Disney movie\, princess and all\, with a Star Wars skin slapped on. Disney really dropped the ball when it comes to the long time fans\, and extended universe fans. For their sake\, they better hope it takes off with this younger generation. I can now say that Star Wars has lost its appeal for me\, never would of thought I'd go from waiting forever in lines for opening night tickets\, to not caring what happens with the material now. It's a shame really.
